description:
The content that appears when the select is open.
It's based on [Radix UI Select Content](https://www.radix-ui.com/primitives/docs/components/select#content).

position.description: Whether to show the select items below (`popper`) or over (`item-aligned`) the select input.

sideOffset.description: The distance of the content pop-up in pixels from the select input. Only available when position is set to popper.

collisionPadding.description: The distance in pixels from the boundary edges where collision detection should occur. Only available when position is set to popper.
